targets.expr:
{job="syslog", host="$host"}
|~ "block|pass" # filter to get only firewall logs
!= "icmp" # filter only not ICMP packages
| pattern `<_>,<_>,<_>,<RuleID>,<Interface>,<Reason>,<Action>,<Direction>,<IPVersion>,<_>,<_>,<TTL>,<ID>,<Offset>,<IPFlags>,<ProtocolNr>,<Protocol>,<Length>,<SourceIP>,<DestinationIP>,<SourcePort>,<DestinationPort>,<_>,<TCPFlags>,<Seq>,<_>,<_>`

{job="syslog", host="$host"}
|~ "block|pass" # filter to get only firewall logs
|= "icmp" # filter only ICMP packages
| pattern `<_>,<_>,<_>,<RuleID>,<Interface>,<Reason>,<Action>,<Direction>,<IPVersion>,<_>,<_>,<TTL>,<ID>,<Offset>,<IPFlags>,<ProtocolNr>,<Protocol>,<Length>,<SourceIP>,<DestinationIP>,<_>`

{job="syslog-ids",host="$host"} != "Drop" |~ "$searchregex"
|= "Priority" # filter to exclude not IDS/IPS events
| pattern `[<_>:<ruleId>:<_>] <rule> [Classification: <classification>] [Priority: <priority>] {<protocol>} <sourceIP>:<sourcePort> -> <destinationIP>:<destinationPort>`
| protocol!~"IPv6.*"

{job="syslog-ids",host="$host"} |= "Drop" |~ "$searchregex"
|= "Priority" # filter to exclude not IDS/IPS events
| pattern `[<action>] [<_>:<ruleId>:<_>] <rule> [Classification: <classification>] [Priority: <priority>] {<protocol>} <sourceIP>:<sourcePort> -> <destinationIP>:<destinationPort>`
| protocol!~"IPv6.*"

panels.description: Top 10 dropped potential attacks by port.
panels.title: Potential Attacks by DestinationPort
